Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to requiring affordable housing projects to calculate and only use the area median income for the specific zip code that the project is located in
Summary: Relates to requiring affordable housing projects to calculate and only use the area median income for the specific zip code that the project is located in for determining affordability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to requiring affordable housing projects to calculate and only use the area median income for the specific zip code that the project is located in for determining affordability
